attributes.title: So disappointed!
attributes.review: I am super bored in quarantine right now, so I decided to download some games. As it turns out, this is just some app promoting a (fake) blonde Oompa Loompa trying to run for president of the chocolate factory? Personally, I would vote for Willy Wonka because he is inclusive and anti-racist. This guy has reportedly been really racist towards the non-orange Oompa Loompas. This app should get zero stars!
